languages.text: {n}Блюститель смущенно берется за работу. Спустя какое-то время он презентует вам бюст {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Императора{/g} размером с пол-ладони. Лик Владыки Человечества вытесан с поразительным вниманием к деталям — вы видели статуи, отлитые менее искусно.{/n}

{n}The enforcer looks slightly flustered, but he quickly gets to work. After a little while, he presents you with a bust of the {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Emperor{/g} about half the size of your palm. The Emperor's visage has been recreated with incredible precision and attention to detail — the small carving surpasses the work of many a skilled sculptor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Блюститель смущенно берется за работу. Спустя какое-то время он презентует вам бюст {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Императора{/g} размером с пол-ладони. Лик Владыки Человечества вытесан с поразительным вниманием к деталям — вы видели статуи, отлитые менее искусно.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Flustered, the enforcer gets to work. After a little while, he presents you with a bust of the Emperor half the size of your palm. His visage is carved with incredible attention to detail — you have seen statues sculpted less skilfully than this.{/n}

The Emperor's visage has been recreated with incredible precision and attention to detail — the small carving surpasses the work of many a skilled sculptor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le prévôt semble légèrement décontenancé, mais il se met tout de suite au travail. Au bout d'un certain temps, il vous présente un buste de l'{g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Empereur{/g} qui tient dans votre paume. Son visage a été reproduit avec une précision et des détails remarquables qui surpassent les œuvres de nombreux sculpteurs de talent.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The enforcer looks slightly flustered, but he quickly gets to work. After a little while, he presents you with a bust of the {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Emperor{/g} about half the size of your palm. The Emperor's visage has been recreated with incredible precision and attention to detail — the small carving surpasses the work of many a skilled sculptor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le prévôt semble légèrement décontenancé, mais il se met tout de suite au travail. Au bout d'un certain temps, il vous présente un buste de l'Empereur qui tient dans votre paume. Son visage a été reproduit avec une précision et des détails remarquables qui surpassent les œuvres de nombreux sculpteurs de talent.{/n}

{n}Le prévôt semble légèrement décontenancé, mais il se met tout de suite au travail. Au bout d'un certain temps, il vous présente un buste de l'Empereur qui tient dans votre paume. Son visage a été reproduit avec une précision et des détails remarquables qui surpassent les œuvres de nombreux sculpteurs de talent.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El guardia parece algo avergonzado, pero se pone a trabajar rápidamente. Después de unos minutos, te presenta un busto del {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Emperador{/g} que ocupa la mitad de tu mano. Su imagen se ha recreado con una precisión y un nivel de detalle excepcionales. Esta pequeña talla sobrepasa las obras de muchos escultores reconocidos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The enforcer looks slightly flustered, but he quickly gets to work. After a little while, he presents you with a bust of the {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Emperor{/g} about half the size of your palm. The Emperor's visage has been recreated with incredible precision and attention to detail — the small carving surpasses the work of many a skilled sculptor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El guardia parece algo avergonzado, pero se pone a trabajar rápidamente. Después de unos minutos, te presenta un busto del Emperador que ocupa la mitad de tu mano. Su imagen se ha recreado con una precisión y un nivel de detalle excepcionales. Esta pequeña talla sobrepasa las obras de muchos escultores reconocidos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}执法者看起来有些局促不安，但很快就开始雕刻起来。过了一会儿，他将一尊雕好的{g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}帝皇{/g}半身像递给了你，大约有你手掌的一半大小。这尊小小的雕像甚至比许多技艺精湛的雕刻家的作品更加出色，帝皇脸上各种各样的细节雕刻得栩栩如生。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The enforcer looks slightly flustered, but he quickly gets to work. After a little while, he presents you with a bust of the {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Emperor{/g} about half the size of your palm. The Emperor's visage has been recreated with incredible precision and attention to detail — the small carving surpasses the work of many a skilled sculptor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}执法者看起来有些局促不安，但很快就开始雕刻起来。过了一会儿，他将一尊雕好的帝皇半身像递给了你，大约有你手掌的一半大小。这尊小小的雕像甚至比许多技艺精湛的雕刻家的作品更加出色，帝皇脸上各种各样的细节雕刻得栩栩如生。{/n}

languages.text: {n}執行官は少し慌てた様子だったが、すぐに仕事に取りかかった。しばらくすると、彼はあなたの手のひらの半分ほどの大きさの{g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}皇帝{/g}の胸像を差し出した。その小さな彫刻は、多くの熟練した彫刻家の仕事を凌駕している。皇帝のお顔は、細部に至るまで驚くほど精密に再現されていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The enforcer looks slightly flustered, but he quickly gets to work. After a little while, he presents you with a bust of the {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Emperor{/g} about half the size of your palm. The Emperor's visage has been recreated with incredible precision and attention to detail — the small carving surpasses the work of many a skilled sculptor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}執行官は少し慌てた様子だったが、すぐに仕事に取りかかった。しばらくすると、彼はあなたの手のひらの半分ほどの大きさの皇帝の胸像を差し出した。その小さな彫刻は、多くの熟練した彫刻家の仕事を凌駕している。皇帝のお顔は、細部に至るまで驚くほど精密に再現されていた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Enforcer wirkt etwas perplex, macht sich aber rasch ans Werk. Nach einer kleinen Weile präsentiert er dir eine Büste des {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Imperators{/g}, etwa halb so groß wie deine Handfläche. Das Antlitz des Imperators wurde mit unglaublicher Präzision und Detailtreue nachgestellt. Die kleine Schnitzerei übertrifft die Kunstfertigkeit der Werke vieler talentierter Bildhauer.{/n}

The Emperor's visage has been recreated with incredible precision and attention to detail — the small carving surpasses the work of many a skilled sculptor.{/n}

Das Antlitz des Imperators wurde mit unglaublicher Präzision und Detailtreue nachgestellt. Die kleine Schnitzerei übertrifft die Kunstfertigkeit der Werke vieler talentierter Bildhauer.{/n}

languages.text: {n}İnfazcı biraz tedirgin görünüyor ancak hızla işe koyuluyor. Bir süre sonra sana {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}İmparator{/g}'un, avcunun yarısı büyüklüğünde bir büstünü takdim ediyor. İmparator'un çehresi muazzam bir hassasiyetle ve detaylara özen gösterilerek işlenmiş. Küçük oyma, birçok yetenekli heykeltıraşın çalışmalarından daha üst kalite.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The enforcer looks slightly flustered, but he quickly gets to work. After a little while, he presents you with a bust of the {g|Encyclopedia:EmperorGlossary}Emperor{/g} about half the size of your palm. The Emperor's visage has been recreated with incredible precision and attention to detail — the small carving surpasses the work of many a skilled sculptor.{/n}
